Nwgnuav tub txug lub sijhawm kws txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb lawm; nwgnuav luas tub yuav muab tug kws kaav lub nplajteb nuav ntab tawm moog.
Thaus luas muab kuv dlai, kuv yuav coj txhua tsaav tuabneeg lug cuag kuv.”
(Yexus has le ntawd, tub yog nwg qha has tas, nwg yuav tuag txomnyem le caag.)

Cov tuabneeg coob coob ntawd teb has tas, “Peb txuj Kevcai qha rua peb has tas, tug Mexiyas yuav nrug peb nyob moog ibtxhis le. Ua le caag koj tsua has tas, luas yuav muab Tuabneeg Leej Tub dlai? Tuabneeg Leej Tub yog leejtwg?”

Yexus teb has tas, “Qhov kaaj tseem yuav nrug mej nyob ib nyuas ntu ntxiv. Thaus kws tseem pum kev, mej ca le rau sab ntso ua mej lub neej, nyob tsaam tsaus mej ntuj; rua qhov tug kws maub mo ntuj, nwg yeej tsi paub has tas nwg taabtom moog qhov twg.

Yog le ntawd, thaus tseem muaj qhov kaaj, mej ca le ntseeg qhov kaaj, kuas mej txhaj tau ua cov tuabneeg kws nyob qhov kaaj.” Tom qaab kws Yexus has le ntawd taag, Yexus txawm tsiv moog nkaum kuas puab tsi pum nwg.
Txawm yog Yexus ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb rua puab pum los puab tsi ntseeg nwg le,
tej nuav txhaj muaj tav lawv le Yaxayas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug tau has tseg lawm has tas: “Tug Tswv, leejtwg txhaj yuav ntseeg tej lug kws peb qha? Tug Tswv ua nwg lub fwjchim rua leejtwg pum?”
Tub yog vim le ntawd, puab txhaj tsi ntseeg, rua qhov Yaxayas has ntxiv tas,

“Vaajtswv ua rua puab dligmuag hab ua rua puab lub sab ruag, kuas puab qhovmuag tsi pum kev hab puab lub sab tsi totaub; Vaajtswv has tas, ua le ntawd kuas puab tsi xob lug cuag kuv kuas kuv khu puab.”
Yaxayas has le ntawd, rua qhov nwg tub pum Yexus tug tshwjchim hab nwg has txug Yexus zaaj ntaag.

Txawm yog le ntawd los cov Yudais tej numtswv kuj muaj ntau leej ntseeg Yexus; tabsis vim puab ntshai cov Falixais, puab txhaj tsi qha rua suavdlawg paub, kuas puab tsi raug ntab tawm huv lub tsev saablaaj moog.
Puab nyam kuas tuabneeg qhuas puab heev dlua le nyam kuas Vaajtswv qhua puab.
Yexus has nrov nrov rua suavdlawg tas, “Tug kws ntseeg kuv, tsi yog nwg ntseeg kuv tuab leeg xwb, tabsis yog nwg ntseeg tug kws khaiv kuv lug hab.
Tug kws pum kuv, tug ntawd pum tug kws khaiv kuv lug hab.
Kuv lug ua qhov kaaj rua tuabneeg nplajteb pum kev, txhua tug kws ntseeg kuv yuav tsi nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj lawm.

Tug kws nov kuv tej lug hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug, kuv yuav tsi txav txim rua tug ntawd. Kuv tsi yog lug txav txim rua tuabneeg nplajteb, tabsis yog kuv lug cawm tuabneeg nplajteb kuas puab dlim puab lub txim.
Muaj ib tug yuav txav txim rua tug kws tsi leeg paub kuv hab tsi noog kuv tej lug qha. Thaus txug nub kawg, tej lug kws kuv qha lawm yuav ua tug txav txim rua tug ntawd.
Rua qhov tej lug kws kuv has ntawd tsi yog kuv has lawv le kuv lub sab, tabsis yog leej Txiv kws khaiv kuv lug kuas kuv has hab kuv qha.
Kuv paub has tas, nwg tej lug saamfwm yog txujsa moog ibtxhis. Tej lug kws kuv has, puavleej yog leej Txiv qha rua kuv has.”

Thaus yuav txug nub ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, Yexus paub has tas tub txug lub sijhawm kws nwg yuav tawm huv lub nplajteb nuav rov moog cuag leej Txiv lawm. Yexus yeej ibtxwm hlub nwg cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav, hab nwg yuav hlub puab moog txug nub kawg le.
Thaus Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim taabtom noj mo, dlaab Ntxwgnyoog tub xub tshoov Ximoos Ixakali-us tug tub Yudas lub sab lawm, kuas nwg ntxeev sab rua Yexus.
Yexus paub has tas leej Txiv tub muab ib puas tsaav yaam tso rua nwg kaav huv tuabsi lawm; nwg paub has tas Vaajtswv khaiv nwg lug hab nwg yuav rov moog cuag Vaajtswv.
Yog le ntawd, Yexus txawm sawv ntawm rooj mov moog hle nwg lub tsho ntev, hab muab ib txuj phuam lug sa ntawm dluav.
Ces nwg muab dlej laub rua huv lub phab hab nqaa lug ntxuav cov thwjtim kutaw hab muab txuj phuam kws nwg sa ntawm dluav so puab kutaw.
Thaus Yexus ntxuav lug txug ntawm Ximoos Petus, Ximoos Petus txawm has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yuav ntxuav kuv kutaw hab los?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Taamsim nuav koj tseem tsi tau totaub qhov kws kuv ua nuav, tabsis lwm nub koj yuav totaub.”
Petus has tas, “Kuv yeej tsi pub koj ntxuav kuv kutaw ib zag le!” Yexus teb has tas, “Yog kuv tsi ntxuav koj kutaw, koj yuav tsi tau ua kuv tug thwjtim lawm.”
Ximoos Petus teb has tas, “Tug Tswv, yog le ntawd thov tsi xob ntxuav kuv kutaw xwb, tabsis ntxuav kuv teg hab taubhau huv tuabsi.”

Yexus has tas, “Tug kws dlaa dlej, nwg lub cev yeej huv lawm, tsi taag yuav rov ntxuav dlua, tsuas ntxuav nwg kutaw lawm xwb.  Mej txhua tug puavleej huv lawm, tsuas yog tshuav ib tug xwb txhaj tsi huv.”
(Yexus paub has tas tug twg yog tug kws yuav ntxeev sab rua nwg; yog le ntawd nwg txhaj has tas, “Mej txhua tug puavleej huv lawm, tsuas yog tshuav ib tug xwb txhaj tsi huv.”)

Tom qaab kws Yexus ntxuav puab kutaw taag lawm, nwg rov muab nwg lub tsho ntev lug naav, hab rov lug nyob nwg lub chaw ntawm rooj mov. Yexus nug cov thwjtim has tas, “Qhov kws kuv ua rua mej nuav, mej puas totaub?
Mej hu kuv ua Xwbfwb hab tug Tswv, mej hu le ntawd yog lawm, rua qhov kuv yeej yog tag.
Kuv yog mej tug Tswv hab yog mej tug Xwbfwb, kuv tub ntxuav mej kutaw lawm, yog le ntawd, mej ib leeg yuavtsum ntxuav ib leeg kutaw.
Kuv ua qauv le nuav qha rua mej, kuas mej xyum ua lawv le kuv ua rua mej lawm.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, tug qhev yeej tsi muaj fwjchim luj dlua nwg tug tswv, hab tug tubkhai yeej tsi muaj fwjchim luj dlua tug kws khaiv nwg moog.
Thaus mej paub tej nuav lawm, yog mej ua lawv le ntawd, mej yuav tau kev kaaj sab!

“Kuv tsi yog has txug mej txhua tug; kuv yeej paub cov kws kuv xaiv ca lawm. Tabsis yuavtsum muaj lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws has tas, ‘Tug kws koom nrug kuv noj ib taig mov yuav ntxeev sab rua kuv.’
Kuv xub qha rua mej ua ntej kws muaj tej nuav, kuas thaus muaj tej nuav tshwm tuaj, mej txhaj yuav ntseeg has tas, ‘Kuv Yog Tug Kws Kuv Yog.’
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, tug kws leeg yuav tug kws kuv khaiv moog, tug ntawd leeg yuav kuv; hab tug kws leeg yuav kuv, tug ntawd yeej leeg yuav tug kws khaiv kuv lug.”
Tom qaab kws Yexus has le ntawd taag, nwg nyuaj sab heev hab nwg has tas, “Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, mej cov ko muaj ib tug yuav ntxeev sab rua kuv.”
Cov thwjtim ib leeg txawm saib ib leeg, puab tsi paub has tas tug kws Yexus has ntawd yog leejtwg.
Yexus cov thwjtim tug kws Yexus hlub heev, nwg nyob npuas Yexus.
Ximoos Petus txawm ua laaj muag rua tug thwjtim ntawd hab has tas, “Koj nug Yexus saib, tug kws nwg has ntawd yog leejtwg?”
Ces tug thwjtim ntawd tig moog nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, tug ntawd yog leejtwg?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Kuv muab ncuav ntsw cev rua leejtwg noj; ces yog tug ntawd ntaag.” Yog le ntawd, Yexus txawm muab ncuav ntsw cev rua Ximoos Ixakali-us tug tub Yudas noj.
Thaus Yudas txais nkaus qhov ncuav ntawd, dlaab Ntxwgnyoog txawm nkaag rua huv Yudas. Yexus has rua Yudas has tas, “Koj yuav ua dlaabtsi, koj ca le ua kawgkag!”
Cov thwjtim kws nyob ntawm rooj mov, tsi muaj ib tug totaub has tas, vim le caag Yexus has le ntawd rua Yudas.

Yudas yog tug ceev lub naab nyaj, cov thwjtim qee leej txhaj xaav has tas, Yexus khaiv Yudas moog yuav tej yaam lug rua puab siv ua kevcai lossis Yexus kuas Yudas muab mivntsiv nyaj moog pub rua cov tuabneeg pluag.
Yudas txais nkaus qhov ncuav ntawd noj, taamsim ntawd Yudas txawm tawm plawg moog lawm. Thaus ntawd tub tsaus ntuj lawm.
Tom qaab kws Yudas tawm moog lawm, Yexus has tas, “Nwgnuav tub txug lub sijhawm kws Tuabneeg Leej Tub tau koob meej lawm; nwgnuav nwg yuav ua rua Vaajtswv tau koob meej.
Yog Tuabneeg Leej Tub ua rua Vaajtswv tau koob meej lawm, Vaajtswv yuav ua rua Tuabneeg Leej Tub tau koob meej ib yaam nkaus hab, Vaajtswv yuav ua le ntawd taamsim nuav ntaag.

Kuv cov mivnyuas, kuv yuav nrug mej nyob tsi ntev lawm. Mej yuav nrhav kuv; tabsis nwgnuav kuv qha rua mej ib yaam le kuv tub qha rua cov Yudais tej numtswv lawm has tas, ‘Qhov chaw kws kuv yuav moog ntawd, mej moog tsi tau.’
Nwgnuav kuv muab ib txuj kevcai tshab rua mej: mej ib leeg yuavtsum hlub ib leeg. Mej ib leeg yuavtsum hlub ib leeg ib yaam le kuv hlub mej.
Yog mej ib leeg hlub ib leeg, suavdlawg txhaj yuav paub has tas mej yog kuv cov thwjtim.”

Ximoos Petus nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yuav moog qhov twg?” Yexus teb has tas, “Qhov chaw kws kuv yuav moog ntawd, nwgnuav koj nrug kuv moog tsi tau, tabsis lwm nub koj maam le lawv kuv qaab lug.”
Petus nug has tas, “Tug Tswv, ua le caag kuv nrug koj moog tsi tau? Kuv yeej txaus sab tuag theej koj!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Koj yeej txaus sab tuag theej kuv tag los? Kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, thaus qab tsi tau qua koj yuav has peb zag has tas koj tsi paub kuv.”
Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej tsi xob txhawj hab tsi xob nyuaj sab, mej ca le ntseeg  Vaajtswv hab ntseeg kuv.
Huv kuv Txiv lub tsev muaj ntau chaav, hab kuv taabtom yuav moog tu chaw rua mej. Yog tsi muaj le ntawd, kuv yeej yuav tsi qha le nuav rua mej.
Thaus kws kuv tu tau chaw rua mej lawm, kuv yuav rov qaab lug hab tog mej moog nrug kuv nyob, kuv nyob qhov twg mej yeej yuav nrug kuv nyob qhov ntawd.
Qhov chaw kws kuv yuav moog, mej tub paub kev moog lawm.”
Thaumas has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, peb tsi paub sov koj yuav moog qhov twg; yog le ntawd, peb yuav ua le caag paub kev moog?”
Yexus teb Thaumas has tas, “Kuv yog txujkev, yog qhov tseeb, hab yog txujsa; tsi muaj leejtwg moog cuag tau leej Txiv, tsuas yog moog ntawm kuv moog xwb txhaj tau.”
Yexus has rua puab has tas, “Nwgnuav mej tub paub kuv lawm, mej yeej yuav paub  kuv Txiv hab, txij nuav moog mej yuav paub nwg hab pum nwg.”
Filis has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, thov koj qha leej Txiv rua peb pum, kuas peb txaus sab.”

Yexus teb has tas, “Filis, kuv tub nrug mej nyob ntev lug lawm, ua le caag koj tseem tsi tau paub kuv hab? Tug kws pum kuv, tug ntawd tub pum leej Txiv lawm. Ua le caag koj tseem yuav has tas, ‘Thov koj qha leej Txiv rua peb pum hab’?

Filis, koj tsi ntseeg has tas, kuv nyob huv Leej Txiv hab Leej Txiv nyob huv kuv los? Yexus has rua nwg cov thwjtim has tas, tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej nuav, tsi yog kuv tej lug, tabsis yog Leej Txiv tug kws nyob huv kuv ua nwg teg num xwb.
Mej ca le ntseeg tej lug kws kuv has tas, kuv nyob huv Leej Txiv hab leej Txiv nyob huv kuv. Txawm yog mej tsi ntseeg le kuv has los mej yuavtsum ntseeg tej num kws kuv ua.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, tug kws ntseeg kuv yuav ua tej num kws kuv ua, tsi yog le ntawd xwb, nwg tseem yuav ua tau ntau dlua tej kws kuv ua, rua qhov kuv moog cuag leej Txiv lawm.
Hab yog mej tuav kuv lub npe thov ib yaam dlaabtsi kuv yuav muab yaam ntawd rua mej, tej kws leej Tub ua ntawd yuav ua rua leej Txiv tau ntsejmuag.
Yog mej tuav kuv  lub npe thov kuas kuv ua ib yaam dlaabtsi, kuv yuav ua yaam ntawd rua mej.
“Yog mej hlub kuv, mej yeej yuav ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm.
Kuv yuav thov leej Txiv, hab nwg yuav khaiv dlua ib tug paab lug, tug ntawd yuav nrug mej nyob moog ibtxhis.

Nwg yog Vaaj Ntsujplig, nwg yuav qha Vaajtswv zaaj kws yog qhov tseeb rua mej. Tuabneeg nplajteb tsi leeg yuav nwg, rua qhov puab tsi pum nwg lossis tsi paub nwg. Tabsis mej paub nwg, rua qhov nwg nrug mej nyob hab nwg yuav nyob  huv mej lub sab.
“Kuv yuav tsi tso mej ua ntsuag ib zag le; kuv yuav rov qaab lug cuag mej.
Tshuav tsi ntev tuabneeg nplajteb yuav tsi pum kuv lawm, tabsis mej yuav pum kuv; mej yuav muaj txujsa nyob, rua qhov kuv muaj txujsa nyob.
Thaus txug nub ntawd, mej yuav paub has tas kuv nyob huv Leej Txiv hab mej nyob huv kuv, ib yaam le kuv nyob huv mej.
“Tug kws leeg yuav kuv tej lug qha hab ua lawv le tej lug ntawd, tug ntawd yog tug kws hlub kuv. Tug kws hlub kuv, kuv Txiv yuav hlub tug ntawd; kuv yuav hlub tug ntawd hab qha kuv rua nwg paub.”
Yudas (kws tsi yog Yudas Ixakali-us) has tas, “Tug Tswv, ua le caag koj yuav qha koj rua peb paub xwb, koj tsua tsi qha koj rua tuabneeg nplajteb paub?”
Yexus teb Yudas has tas, “Tug kws hlub kuv yeej ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha. Kuv Txiv yuav hlub tug ntawd, kuv Txiv hab kuv yuav lug cuag nwg hab nrug nwg nyob.
Tug kws tsi hlub kuv yeej tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha. Hab tej lug kws mej nov kuv qha ntawd tsi yog kuv tej lug, tabsis yog leej Txiv tug kws khaiv kuv lug tej lug.
“Nwgnuav kuv tseem nrug mej nyob, kuv txhaj qha tej nuav rua mej.
Tug paab kws yog Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv kws kuv thov kuas leej Txiv khaiv lug, nwg yuav qha txhua yaam rua mej hab paab kuas mej ncu txhua yaam kws kuv tau qha rua mej lawm.
“Kuv muab kuv txujkev kaaj sab rua mej; txujkev kaaj sab kws kuv muab pub rua mej, kuv tsi muab rua mej le tuabneeg nplajteb muab. Mej tsi xob txhawj, tsi xob nyuaj sab hab tsi xob ntshai.

Mej tub nov kuv has rua mej has tas, ‘Kuv yuav moog, tabsis kuv yuav rov qaab lug cuag mej.’ Yog mej hlub kuv, mej yeej yuav zoo sab rua qhov kws kuv moog cuag leej Txiv; rua qhov nwg muaj fwjchim luj dlua kuv.
Nwgnuav kuv qha tej nuav rua mej, thaus muaj lawm, mej txhaj yuav ntseeg kuv.
Kuv yuav tsi tau nrug mej thaam ntev lawm, rua qhov tug kws kaav lub nplajteb taabtom lug lawm. Nwg tsi muaj fwjchim kaav kuv,
tabsis kuv ua ib puas tsaav yaam lawv le leej Txiv kuas kuv ua, tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj paub has tas kuv hlub leej Txiv. “Ca le sawv peb moog.
“Kuv yog tsob tseem txiv maab, hab kuv Txiv yog tug kws tu.
Nwg muab txhua ceg maab kws tsi txi txiv txav tawm ntawm kuv moog povtseg. Txhua ceg maab kws txi txiv nwg muab taav kuas hajyam txi txiv ncw.
Tej lug kws kuv qha mej, tub yog kuv ntxuav kuas mej huv ntaag.

Mej ca le txuas rua ntawm kuv hab kuv yuav txuas rua ntawm mej. Tug ceg maab kws tsi txuas rua ntawm txuj maab yeej txi tsi taug txiv. Ib yaam le ntawd, yog mej tsi txuas rua ntawm kuv, mej yeej txi tsi taug txiv.
“Kuv yog tsob maab, mej yog cov ceg. Tug kws txuas rua ntawm kuv hab kuv txuas rua ntawm nwg, tug ntawd yuav txi txiv ncw; yog mej tsi txuas rua ntawm kuv, mej yeej ua tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Tug kws tsi txuas rua ntawm kuv, tug ntawd zoo ib yaam le tug ceg maab kws luas muab txav povtseg; thaus qhuav lawm, luas yuav muab sua moog pov hlawv kuas kub nyab taag huv tuabsi.
Yog mej txuas rua ntawm kuv hab mej khaws kuv tej lug ca rua nruab sab lawm, mej xaav yuav yaam twg, mej ca le thov mej yuav tau yaam ntawd.
Yog mej txi txiv ncw, kuv Txiv yuav tau ntsejmuag, hab yog mej ua le ntawd, mej yuav tau ua kuv cov thwjtim.
Kuv hlub mej ib yaam le kuv Txiv hlub kuv; mej yuavtsum muaj lub sab hlub ib yaam le kuv.
Yog mej ua lawv le kuv tej lug, mej yuav muaj lub sab hlub ib yaam le kuv ua lawv le kuv Txiv tej lug hab kuv muaj lub sab hlub ib yaam le nwg.
“Kuv has tej nuav rua mej kuas mej zoo sab ib yaam le kuv zoo sab, mej yuav zoo sab kawg nkaus le.
Kuv lu lug saamfwm yog le nuav: mej ib leeg yuavtsum hlub ib leeg, ib yaam le kuv hlub mej.
Tug kws muaj kev hlub luj tshaaj plawg, yog tug kws zoo sab tuag theej nwg cov phoojywg.
Yog mej ua lawv le kuv has, mej txhaj yog kuv cov phoojywg.

Nwgnuav kuv tsi hu mej ua tubkhai lawm, rua qhov tug tubkhai tsi paub sov nwg tug tswv ua dlaabtsi. Tabsis kuv hu mej ua phoojywg, rua qhov kuv tub qha txhua yaam kws kuv Txiv qha rua kuv rua mej lawm.
Tsi yog mej xaiv kuv, tabsis yog kuv xaiv mej hab tsaa mej kuas moog txi cov txiv kws nyob moog ibtxhis. Yog mej tuav kuv lub npe thov yaam twg, leej Txiv yuav pub yaam ntawd rua mej.
Tej lug kws kuv saamfwm rua mej yog le nuav: mej ib leeg yuavtsum hlub ib leeg.
“Yog tuabneeg nplajteb ntxub mej, mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, puab tub xub ntxub kuv ua ntej lawm.

Yog mej nyam ua lawv le tuabneeg nplajteb ua, ces tuabneeg nplajteb yuav hlub mej. Tabsis mej tsi nyam ua lawv tuabneeg nplajteb ua, rua qhov kuv tub xaiv mej tawm huv nplajteb nuav lawm; yog le ntawd tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj le ntxub mej.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej has tas, ‘Tug tubqhe yeej tsi muaj fwjchim luj dlua nwg tug tswv.’ Yog puab tsimtxom kuv, puab yuav tsimtxom mej hab; yog puab ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha, puab yuav ua lawv le mej tej lug qha hab.
Puab yuav ua tej nuav rua mej, vim mej yog kuv le, rua qhov puab tsi paub tug kws khaiv kuv lug.
Yog kuv tsi tau lug qha puab, puab yeej yuav tsi muaj txim; tabsis nwgnuav puab has tsi tau has tas puab tsi muaj txim.
Tug kws ntxub kuv, tug ntawd yeej ntxub kuv Txiv hab.
Yog kuv tsi tau lug ua tej num kws tsi tau muaj tuabneeg ua dlua rua puab pum, ces puab yeej tsi muaj txim; tabsis puab tub pum tej kws kuv ua lawm, puab txhaj ntxub kuv hab kuv Txiv.
Yeej yuav muaj le nuav txhaj lawv le tej lug kws sau tseg rua huv puab txuj kevcai has tas, ‘Kuv tub tsi tau ua txhum los puab ca le ntxub kuv.’
“Tug Paab yog Vaaj Ntsujplig, nwg lug qha Vaajtswv zaaj kws yog qhov tseeb hab yog leej Txiv khaiv lug. Kuv yuav kuas leej Txiv khaiv nwg lug, hab nwg yuav qha kuv zaaj rua mej.
Hab mej yuav qha kuv zaaj, rua qhov mej yeej nrug kuv nyob thaus chivthawj lug lawm.
“Kuv qha tej nuav rua mej, kuas mej txhaj tsi tso kev ntseeg tseg.
Puab yuav ntab mej tawm huv tej tsev saablaaj moog, hab tub yuav txug lub sijhawm kws puab coj mej moog tua povtseg, qhov kws puab ua le ntawd, puab xaav has tas yog puab ua Vaajtswv teg num.
Puab yuav ua le nuav rua mej, rua qhov puab tsi paub leej Txiv hab tsi paub kuv.

Kuv xub has le nuav qha rua mej, kuas thaus txug lub sijhawm kws puab tsimtxom mej, mej txhaj le yuav ncu txug tej lug kws kuv tub qha rua mej lawm. “Thaus chivthawj kuv tsi tau qha tej nuav rua mej, rua qhov kuv tseem nrug mej nyob.
Tabsis nwgnuav, kuv yuav moog cuag tug kws khaiv kuv lug, txawm le ntawd los mej tub tsi muaj ib tug nug has tas kuv yuav moog qhov twg.
Nwgnuav kuv qha tej nuav rua mej, mej yuav nyuaj sab kawg le.
Tabsis kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, qhov kws kuv ncaim mej moog yuav zoo dlua, yog kuv tsi moog, tug paab yuav tsi lug cuag mej. Tabsis yog kuv moog lawm, kuv yuav khaiv nwg lug nrug mej nyob.
Thaus nwg lug lawm, nwg yuav qha rua tuabneeg nplajteb kuas paub txug kev txhum, kev ncaaj nceeg, hab Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim:
qhov kws puab muaj kev txhum, vim puab tsi ntseeg kuv;
qhov kws muaj kev ncaaj nceeg, vim kuv yuav moog cuag leej Txiv, hab mej yuav tsi pum kuv lawm;
qhov kws muaj kev txav txim, vim tug kws kaav lub nplajteb tub raug txav txim lawm.
“Tseem tshuav ntau zaaj kws kuv xaav qha rua mej, tabsis ntshai mej yuav ris tsi taug.

Thaus Vaaj Ntsujplig tug kws qha qhov tseeb lug lawm, nwg yuav qha qhov tseeb rua mej; nwg yuav tsi has lawv le nwg xaav, tabsis nwg tsuas has tej kws nwg tau nov, hab nwg yuav qha tej kws yuav muaj lug yaav tom ntej rua mej.
Nwg yuav ua rua kuv tau ntsejmuag, rua qhov nwg yuav muab kuv tej lug coj lug qha rua mej.
Tej kws leej Txiv muaj puavleej yog kuv tug hab. Tub yog vim le nuav, Vaaj Ntsujplig txhaj coj tej kws kuv qha rua nwg lawm lug qha rua mej.
“Tsi ntev nuav, mej yuav tsi pum kuv lawm, hab tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, mej yuav rov pum kuv.”

Ces Yexus cov thwjtim qee leej sis thaam has tas, “Nwg has rua peb tas, ‘Tsi ntev nuav, mej yuav tsi pum kuv lawm, hab tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, mej yuav rov pum kuv,’ nwg has le ntawd, yog nwg has le caag? Hab nwg has tas, ‘Rua qhov kuv yuav moog cuag leej Txiv.’
Qhov kws nwg has tas, ‘Tsi ntev nuav, yog has le caag?’ Peb tsi paub sov yog nwg has dlaabtsi.”

Yexus paub tej kws puab xaav nug nwg, yog le ntawd, Yexus txhaj has rua puab tas, “Puas yog mej sis nug txug qhov kws kuv has tas, ‘Tsi ntev nuav, mej yuav tsi pum kuv lawm, hab tom qaab ntawd tsi ntev, mej yuav rov pum kuv’?
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, mej yuav quaj hab ntxhuv sab, tabsis tuabneeg nplajteb yuav zoo sab kawg le; mej yuav raug kev nyuaj sab, tabsis mej tej kev nyuaj sab ntawd yuav hloov ua kev zoo sab.

Tug quaspuj kws muaj mivnyuas huv plaab, thaus yuav txug caij yug nwg txhawj kawg le. Tabsis thaus nwg yug tau tug mivnyuas, nwg tsi ncu qaab qhov kws nwg mob plaab lawm, nwg zoo sab heev, rua qhov nwg yug tau ib tug mivnyuas lug rua huv nplajteb nuav.
Nwgnuav mej muaj kev nyuaj sab ib yaam le ntawd; tabsis kuv yuav rov lug cuag mej dlua, mas mej yuav zoo sab kawg le. Txujkev zoo sab ntawd tsi muaj leejtwg txeeb tau ntawm mej moog le.
“Thaus txug nub ntawd, mej yuav tsi nug kuv ib lus le lawm. Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, yog mej tuav kuv lub npe thov ib yaam dlaabtsi ntawm leej Txiv,  nwg yeej yuav pub yaam ntawd rua mej.
Mej ibtxwm tsi tuav kuv lub npe thov ib yaam dlaabtsi lug txug nwgnuav. Mej ca le thov mej txhaj yuav tau, thaus mej tau lawm, mej yuav zoo sab kawg le.
“Tej kws kuv has rua mej nuav, kuv ua lug pevtxwv has xwb. Tabsis thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, kuv yuav tsi ua lug pevtxwv has rua mej lawm, kuv yuav qha leej Txiv zaaj tseeb tseeb rua mej.
Thaus txug nub ntawd, mej yuav tuav kuv lub npe thov leej Txiv; kuv tsi tau has tas, kuv yuav paab mej thov leej Txiv,
Leej Txiv yeej hlub mej, rua qhov mej hlub kuv hab ntseeg has tas kuv yog tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug.
Yeej yog leej Txiv khaiv kuv lug huv nplajteb nuav, nwgnuav kuv taabtom yuav tawm huv lub nplajteb nuav rov moog cuag leej Txiv.”
Ces Yexus cov thwjtim has rua Yexus has tas, “Zag nuav koj qha tseeb rua peb tag, koj tsi ua lug pevtxwv qha rua peb lawm.
Nwgnuav peb paub has tas koj paub ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi, tsi taag ib tug twg yuav nug koj lawm; tej nuav ua rua peb paub has tas, koj yog tug kws Vaajtswv khaiv lug tag.”
Yexus teb puab has tas, “Nwgnuav mej ntseeg lawm tag los?

Tub yuav txug lub sijhawm, nwgnuav tub txug lub sijhawm ntawd lawm, mej nyag yuav tsiv nyag moog tsev, hab mej yuav tso kuv tseg. Txawm le ntawd los tsi yog kuv tuab leeg nyob xwb, tabsis leej Txiv nrug kuv nyob hab.

Kuv qha tej nuav rua mej, kuas mej cov kws txuas rua ntawm kuv muaj kev kaaj sab lug. Tuabneeg nplajteb yuav tsimtxom mej. Tabsis mej yuavtsum ua sab tawv; rua qhov kuv tub kovyeej lub nplajteb nuav lawm.”

Tom qaab kws Yexus has le ntawd taag, nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib sau ntuj hab has tas, “Txiv, tub txug lub sijhawm lawm; thov koj ua kuas leej Tub tau koob meej, leej Tub txhaj yuav ua rua koj tau koob meej,
rua qhov koj tsaa leej Tub ua tug kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua txhua tug tuabneeg, kuas leej Tub txhaj pub tau txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis rua txhua tug kws koj muab rua nwg lawm.
Txujsa ntev dlhawv moog ibtxhis ntawd, yog qhov kws puab paub koj hab paub has tas koj tuab leeg txhaj yog Vaajtswv, hab paub Yexus Khetos tug kws koj khaiv lug.
Kuv ua rua koj tau koob meej huv nplajteb nuav, teg num kws koj kuas kuv ua, kuv tub ua tav lawm.
Txiv, nwgnuav kuv nyob ntawm koj lub xubndlag, thov koj ua rua kuv tau koob meej ib yaam le thaus tseem tsi tau tsim lub nplajteb nuav, wb ibtxwm tau koob meej.
“Kuv tub qha koj rua cov tuabneeg kws koj muab pub rua kuv huv nplajteb nuav txhua tug paub lawm. Puab yog koj tug, hab koj muab puab pub rua kuv, hab puab ua lawv le koj tej lug.
Nwgnuav puab paub has tas ib puas tsaav yaam kws koj muab rua kuv, puavleej yog koj tug;
rua qhov tej lug kws koj has rua kuv, kuv tub qha huv tuabsi rua puab lawm, puab khaws tej lug ntawd ca, puab paub tseeb hab ntseeg has tas yog koj khaiv kuv lug huv nplajteb nuav.
“Kuv thov koj paab puab; kuv tsi tau thov koj paab tuabneeg nplajteb, tabsis kuv thov koj paab cov tuabneeg kws koj tub muab rua kuv lawm, rua qhov puab yog koj tug.
Ib puas tsaav yaam kws kuv muaj puavleej yog koj tug, hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws koj muaj puavleej yog kuv tug; hab ib puas tsaav yaam ntawd ua rua kuv tau koob meej.

Nwgnuav kuv yuav rov qaab lug cuag koj, kuv yuav tsi nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav ntxiv lawm, tabsis puab tseem nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav. Leej Txiv tug kws dlawbhuv! Thov koj tsomkwm puab ntawm koj lub npe kws muaj fwjchim,  kuas puab txhaj yuav koom tau ib lub sab ib yaam le koj hab kuv koom ib lub sab.

Thaus kws kuv tseem nrug puab nyob, kuv tsomkwm puab ntawm koj lub npe kws muaj fwjchim.  Kuv tsomkwm puab, puab tsi muaj ib tug pluj le, tsuas yog tug kws yeej yuav puamtsuaj, txhaj puamtsuaj xwb, yeej yuav muaj le ntawd kuas tav lawv le tej lug kws tub sau tseg lawm.
Nwgnuav kuv taabtom yuav rov qaab lug cuag koj, thaus kuv tseem nyob huv nplajteb, kuv has tej lug nuav kuas puab zoo sab ib yaam le kuv zoo sab.
Kuv tub qha koj tej lug rua puab lawm, tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj ntxub puab, rua qhov puab tsi yog tuabneeg nplajteb le ib yaam le kuv tsi yog tuabneeg nplajteb le.
Kuv tsi tau thov kuas koj coj puab tawm huv lub nplajteb nuav moog, tabsis kuv thov koj tsomkwm puab kuas puab tsi xob raug dlaab Ntxwgnyoog dlaag ntxag.
Puab tsi yog tuabneeg nplajteb le, ib yaam le kuv tsi yog tuabneeg nplajteb le.
Koj txujlug yog lug tseeb; thov muab koj txujlug tseeb ntxuav kuas puab huv.
Koj khaiv kuv lug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav le caag, kuv khaiv puab moog qha tuabneeg nplajteb ib yaam le ntawd.
Vim puab, kuv txhaj muab kuv fij rua koj, kuv ua le ntawd, kuas puab txhaj muab puab fij rua koj.
“Tsi yog kuv thov koj paab cov tuabneeg nuav xwb, tabsis kuv thov koj paab cov tuabneeg kws nov tej lug kws puab qha hab lug ntseeg kuv,

kuas puab koom ib lub sab. Txiv, thov ca puab nyob huv wb, ib yaam le koj nyob huv kuv hab kuv nyob huv koj, Thov koj paab kuas puab ua tau ib lub sab, tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj paub has tas koj khaiv kuv lug.
Kuv ua rua puab tau koob meej ib yaam le koj ua rua kuv tau koob meej, kuv ua le ntawd kuas puab koom tau ib lub sab ib yaam le wb koom tau ib lub sab.

Kuv nyob huv puab hab koj nyob huv kuv, kuv ua le ntawd kuas puab txhaj koom tau ib lub sab, tuabneeg nplajteb txhaj paub has tas koj khaiv kuv lug, hab paub has tas, koj hlub puab ib yaam le koj hlub kuv.

“Txiv, kuv nyob qhov twg, kuv xaav kuas cov tuabneeg kws koj muab pub rua kuv lawm, nrug kuv nyob qhov ntawd, puab txhaj yuav pum lub fwjchim kws koj pub rua kuv, rua qhov koj yeej hlub kuv thaus tsi tau tsim lub nplajteb lug lawm.
“Txiv, koj yog tug kws ncaaj nceeg, tuabneeg nplajteb tsi paub koj, tabsis kuv paub koj; cov tuabneeg nuav puavleej paub has tas koj khaiv kuv lug.
Kuv qha koj lub npe rua puab paub lawm, hab kuv tseem yuav naj nub qha puab, kuas puab muaj txujkev hlub kws koj hlub kuv nyob huv puab, hab kuv yuav nyob huv puab.”
Thaus Yexus thov Vaajtswv taag lawm, Yexus coj nwg cov thwjtim hlaa lub kwj haa Kiloos moog rua saab tid. Qhov ntawd muaj ib lub vaaj, Yexus hab nwg cov thwjtim txawm moog rua huv lub vaaj ntawd.
Yudas tug kws ntxeev sab rua Yexus yeej paub qhov chaw ntawd hab, rua qhov Yexus tub coj cov thwjtim moog ntau zag huv lub vaaj ntawd lawm.

Yog le ntawd, Yudas txhaj coj ib paab tubrog Loos hab cov kws zuv lub Tuamtsev qee leej kws cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov Falixais tso tuaj rua huv lub vaaj; puab nqaa ntaaj, taws teeb, hab taws tsau cig laam lug tuaj.
Yexus yeej paub tej xwm kws nwg yuav raug, nwg txaav zog moog nug puab has tas, “Mej tuaj nrhav leejtwg?”
Puab teb has tas, “Peb tuaj nrhav Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales.” Yexus teb has puab tas, “Nwg yog kuv ntaag.” Yudas tug kws ntxeev sab rua Yexus, nwg nrug puab sawv ua ke ntawd hab.
Thaus Yexus has rua puab tas, “Nwg yog kuv ntaag,” puab thaub ncho rov qaab hab qaug pawg lug rua huv aav.
Yexus rov qaab nug puab has tas, “Mej tuaj nrhav leejtwg?” Puab teb has tas, “Peb tuaj nrhav Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales.”
Yexus has rua puab has tas, “Kuv tub qha rua mej has tas, nwg yog kuv ntaag, yog mej tuaj nrhav kuv tag, mej ca le tso cov tuabneeg nuav moog.”
(Yexus has le nuav kuas tav lawv le tej lug kws Yexus has tas, “Txiv, cov tuabneeg kws koj muab rua kuv lawm, tsi muaj ib tug pluj le.”)
Ximoos Petus nqaa ib raab ntaaj, nwg rhu hlo nwg raab ntaaj tuab ntaag rua tug Povthawj Hlub ib tug qhev saab nploojntseg xis tu nrho. Tug qhev ntawd hu ua Malekhus.
Yexus has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le muab koj raab ntaaj ntxig rov rua huv naab. Koj xaav has tas kuv yuav tsi haus lub khob kws kuv Txiv muab rua kuv haus nua los?”
Cov tuabneeg Loos tug thawj tubrog hab nwg cov tubrog hab cov Yudais cov tub ceevxwm txawm nteg Yexus hab muab nwg khi.
Puab xub coj Yexus moog cuag Anas kws yog Kaiyafas yawmtxiv, xyoo ntawd Kaiyafas yog tug Povthawj Hlub.
Kaiyafas yog tug kws has rua cov Yudais tej numtswv has tas, ca ib tug tuag zoo dlua ca suavdlawg tuag.
Ximoos Petus hab muaj dlua ib tug thwjtim lawv Yexus qaab moog. Tug Povthawj Hlub paub tug thwjtim ntawd, tug thwjtim ntawd lawv Yexus moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam huv tug Povthawj Hlub lub tsev,
Petus sawv saab roojvaag nrau. Tug thwjtim kws tug Povthawj Hlub paub, nwg tawm tuaj has rua tug ntxhais qhev kws nyob ntawm roojvaag kuas coj Petus lug rua huv tsev.
Tug ntxhais qhev kws nyob ntawm roojvaag has rua Petus has tas, “Koj yog tug txivneej kws raug nteg ntawd ib tug thwjtim los sav?” Petus teb has tas, “Kuv tsi yog.”
Mo ntawd no heev, cov tubkhai hab cov tub ceevxwm rauv tau ib cub thee, hab suavdlawg sawv puagncig nte. Petus txawm moog nrug puab nte hab.
Tug Povthawj Hlub nug Yexus txug Yexus cov thwjtim hab Yexus tej lug qhuab qha.

Yexus teb has tas, “Kuv taabmeeg qha rua tuabneeg suavdlawg; kuv yeej ibtxwm qha huv tej tsev saablaaj hab huv lub Tuamtsev, cov Yudais yeej naj zag tuaj noog kuv qha. Kuv yeej tsi tau has ib zaaj nraim nkoog qhov twg le.
Koj tseem yuav nug kuv ua dlaabtsi? Koj ca le nug cov tuabneeg kws nov kuv qha saib kuv has le caag rua puab; puab yeej paub tej kws kuv qha huv tuabsi.”
Thaus Yexus taabtom has le ntawd, muaj ib tug tub ceevxwm nyob ze ntawd, txawm ca le tuab tawg ncuav rua Yexus ntsejmuag hab has tas, “Koj teb tug Povthawj Hlub le ko los!”
Yexus teb has tas, “Yog kuv has txhum, koj ca le qha kuv qhov txhum rua suavdlawg paub. Tabsis yog kuv has tseeb, ua caag koj laam ntaus kuv ua dlaabtsi?”
Ces Anas txhaj xaa Yexus moog rua Kaiyafas kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub, thaus ntawd puab tseem khi rawv Yexus.

Thaus Ximoos Petus tseem sawv nte tawg, cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd has rua Petus has tas, “Koj yog tug txivneej kws raug nteg ntawd ib tug thwjtim los tsi yog?” Tabsis Petus tsi leeg le, Petus has tas, “Kuv tsi yog.”
Tug Povthawj Hlub ib tug qhev kws yog tug txivneej kws Petus txav ib saab nploojntseg tu ntawd ib tug kwvtij txawm nug Petus has tas, “Puas yog kuv tub pum koj nrug tug txivneej ntawd nyob huv vaaj?”
Petus rov qaab has tas, “Tsi yog kuv.” Taamsim ntawd qab txawm qua.

Thaus kaaj ntug txoog, puab coj Yexus tawm huv Kaiyafas tsev moog rua ntawm Philaj lub loog. Cov Yudais tej numtswv tsi kaam moog huv lub loog, rua qhov puab tsi xaav ua kuas puab tsi huv, puab txhaj noj tau rooj mov kws ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.
Yog le ntawd, Philaj txhaj tawm moog nug puab has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav ua txhum dlaabtsi, mej txhaj coj nwg tuaj cuag kuv?”
Puab teb has tas, “Yog nwg tsi tau ua txhum, peb yeej tsi coj nwg tuaj cuag koj.”
Philaj has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le coj nwg moog hab taug nwg zaaj lawv le mej txuj kevcai.” Cov Yudais teb has tas, “Peb tsi muaj cai muab leejtwg tua povtseg.”
(Qhov nuav muaj lawv le tej lug kws Yexus tub qha ua ntej lawm has tas nwg yuav tuag le caag.)
Philaj rov qaab moog rua huv loog hab hu Yexus lug cuag nwg. Philaj nug Yexus has tas, “Koj yog cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv los?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Koj nug kuv lawv le koj paub lossis yog lwm tug qha kuv zaaj rua koj xwb?.”
Philaj teb has tas, “Koj xaav has tas kuv yog tuabneeg Yudais nua los? Tub yog koj tsaav tuabneeg hab cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj nteg koj tuaj rua kuv xwb. Koj ua txhum dlaabtsi?”

Yexus teb has tas, “Kuv lub tebchaws tsi yog lub nplajteb nuav. Yog kuv lub tebchaws yog lub nplajteb nuav, kuv cov thwjtim yeej yuav tawmtsaam kuas yeej, tsi pub leejtwg nteg tau kuv coj moog rua cov Yudais tej numtswv. Tabsis kuv lub tebchaws tsi yog lub nplajteb nuav.”

Philaj nug Yexus has tas, “Yog le ntawd, koj yog ib tug vaajntxwv los?” Yexus teb has tas, “Koj yog tug kws hu kuv ua vaajntxwv. Tub yog vim le nuav, kuv txhaj lug yug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav hab qha qhov tseeb. Txhua tug kws nyam qhov tseeb yeej noog kuv lug.”

Philaj nug Yexus has tas, “Qhov tseeb yog dlaabtsi?” Thaus Philaj has le ntawd taag, Philaj tawm rov moog cuag cov Yudais rua saab nrau hab has rua puab tas, “Kuv pum has tas, nwg tsi tau ua ib qhov txhum kws txaus txav txim tau rua nwg le.

Tabsis lawv le mej txuj kevcai, txhua zag kws mej ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau kuv tso ib tug tuabneeg raug txim rua mej, thaus lub caij kws mej ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Mej puas xaav kuas kuv tso cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv?”
Puab txawm has nrov nrov rua Philaj has tas, “Tsi xob tso tug txivneej ntawd, koj ca le tso Npalanpas xwb.” (Npalanpas yog ib tug tuabneeg ntxeev num ntxeev tswv.)
Tom qaab ntawd Philaj txawm muab Yexus rua cov tubrog nplawm.
Cov tubrog muab maab xuavpaug ua kauj looj Yexus taubhau; hab puab muab ib lub tsho ntev tsaamxem lab khu rua Yexus naav.
Puab has rua Yexus has tas, “Cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv, koj yuav muaj sa nyob ntev!” Hab puab xuas tawg ncuav rua Yexus ntsejmuag.
Philaj rov tawm tuaj has rua puab has tas, “Mej saib, kuv yuav coj nwg tuaj rua mej, kuas mej paub has tas, kuv tsi pum nwg ua ib qhov txhum kws txaus txav txim rua nwg le.”
Thaus Yexus tawm lug, nwg ntoo rawv lub kauj maab xuavpaug hab naav lub tsho ntev tsaamxem lab. Philaj has rua puab tas, “Mej saib! Tug txivneej ntawd nyob ntawm nuav.”

Thaus cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov tub ceevxwm kws zuv lub Tuamtsev pum Yexus, puab has nrov nrov has tas, “Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig! Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig!” Philaj has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le coj nwg moog hab muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig. Kuv yeej tsi pum nwg ua ib qho txhum kws txaus txav txim rua nwg le.”
Cov Yudais teb Philaj has tas, “Peb muaj ib txuj kevcai, lawv le txuj kevcai ntawd has mas tsimnyog muab nwg tua povtseg, rua qhov nwg khaav has tas nwg yog Vaajtswv tug Tub.”
Thaus Philaj nov puab has le ntawd, ua rua Philaj hajyam ntshai heev.
Philaj rov moog huv nwg lub loog hab nug Yexus has tas, “Koj nyob qhov twg tuaj?” Tabsis Yexus tsi teb Philaj ib lus le.
Philaj has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj txawm tsi teb kuv le los? Koj tsi paub has tas kuv muaj cai tso tau koj, hab muaj cai muab koj ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig nua los?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Koj yeej tsi muaj fwjchim luj dlua kuv, tsuas yog Vaajtswv pub fwjchim rua koj xwb; tug kws nteg kuv coj tuaj rua koj, tug ntawd ua txhum luj kawg le.”

Thaus Philaj nov Yexus has le ntawd, nwg xaav muab Yexus tso. Tabsis cov Yudais has nrov nrov tas, “Yog koj muab nwg tso, mas koj yeej tsi yog Xixas tug phoojywg le. Tug kws khaav has tas nwg yog vaajntxwv, tug ntawd yog Xixas tug yeebncuab.”
Thaus Philaj nov le ntawd, Philaj txawm coj Yexus tawm lug rua saab nrau hab Philaj nyob sau lub rooj txav txim, qhov chaw kws hu ua “Pua Pobzeb.” (Lug Henplais hu ua “Nkanpathas.”)
Thaus ntawd yuav laug taav su, nub ntawd yog nub kws npaaj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Philaj has rua cov Yudais has tas, “Mej tug vaajntxwv nyob ntawm nuav.”

Puab has nrov nrov has tas, “Muab nwg tua povtseg! Muab nwg tua povtseg! Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig!” Philaj txhaj nug puab has tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv muab mej tug vaajntxwv ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig los?” Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj teb has tas, “Peb muaj tuab tug vaajntxwv xwb, tug ntawd yog Xixas.”
Ces Philaj txawm muab Yexus rua cov Yudais coj moog ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig. Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj coj Yexus tawm moog;
hab muab Yexus tug ntoo khaublig rua Yexus kwv, puab coj Yexus moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua “Pobtxhaa Taubhau.” (Lug Henplais hu ua “Khaulakhauthas.”)
Nyob qhov ntawd, puab muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig hab puab coj tau ob tug txivneej tuaj ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, hab muab ib tug txhus rua ib saab, muab Yexus txhus rua huv nruab nraab.
Philaj sau ib dlaim ntawv ntsa rua sau Yexus tug ntoo khaublig. Cov lug ntawd nyeem has le nuav: “Yexus kws yog tuabneeg Naxales, yog cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv.”

Muaj tuabneeg coob leej nyeem dlaim ntawv ntawd, rua qhov thaaj chaw kws muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig nyob tsi dleb ntawm lub nroog. Cov ntawv ntawd sau ua lug Henplais, lug Latees, hab lug Kilis.
Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj has rua Philaj has tas, “Koj tsi xob sau has tas, ‘Cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv,’ tabsis sau has tas, tug txivneej nuav has tas, ‘Kuv yog cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv.’ ”
Philaj teb has tas, “Kuv sau le caag, yuav le ntawd.”

Tom qaab kws cov tubrog muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig lawm, puab muab Yexus tej rig tsho faib ua plaub co, ib leeg yuav ib co. Puab tseem muab Yexus lub tsho ntev lawm hab, lub tsho ntev ntawd ntus thoob plawg tsi muaj kaab lejleeg le.

Cov tubrog sis thaam has tas, “Peb tsi xob muab lub tsho nuav dlua, tabsis ca peb muab twv saib leejtwg tau lub tsho ntawd xwb.” Tej kws puab ua nuav, muaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws has tas: “Puab muab kuv tej rig tsho sis faib, hab muab kuv lub tsho ntev twv saib leejtwg tau.” Tub yog vim le nuav cov tubrog txhaj ua le ntawd.
Thaus ntawd Yexus nam, Yexus nam tug nam hluas, Malis kws yog Kelaupas tug quaspuj, hab Malis Madalas, puab sawv ze ntawm Yexus tug ntoo khaublig.
Yexus pum nwg nam hab tug thwjtim kws nwg hlub heev sawv ua ke ntawd, Yexus has rua nwg nam has tas, “Nam, tug kws nrug koj sawv ntawm ko, yog koj tug tub.”
Yexus has rua tug thwjtim ntawd has tas, “Tug kws nrug koj sawv ntawd ko, yog koj nam.” Txij thaus ntawd lug, tug thwjtim ntawd txawm coj Yexus nam moog nrug nwg nyob lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus paub has tas txhua yaam tav taag lawm, nwg has tas, “Kuv nqhes dlej,” (Nwg has le ntawd kuas muaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug).
Nyob qhov ntawd muaj ib taig kua txiv maab qaub, puab muab ib lub taub ntxuav yag chob rua ntawm ib tug paas hixauv raus cov kua txiv maab qaub ntawd, hab cev moog rua ntawm Yexus qhovncauj.
Yexus haus cov kua txiv maab qaub ntawd, hab Yexus has tas, “Tav lawm lauj!” Ces Yexus txawm nyo hau ntshis hab tu sav nrho taamsim ntawd.

Cov Yudais tej numtswv moog thov Philaj tso cai rua puab muab cov tuabneeg kws ntsa sau ntoo khaublig ntawd tsoo kuas luv ceg hab muab puab txu sau ntoo khaublig lug. Puab ua le nuav rua qhov nub ntawd yog nub Npaaj ua kevcai, cov Yudais tsi xaav ca cov tuabneeg tuag ntawd nyob sau ntoo khaublig nub Xanpataus, rua qhov nub Xanpataus yog nub kws tseemceeb heev.
Cov tubrog txawm moog muab ob tug kws puab muab ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig ib yaam le Yexus tsoo kuas luv ceg, puab xub tsoo ib tug ua ntej, puab maam le tsoo ib tug tom qaab.
Tabsis thaus puab moog txug ntawm Yexus, puab pum has tas Yexus tub tuag lawm, puab txhaj tsi tsoo Yexus ob txhais ceg.
Txawm le ntawd los tseem muaj ib tug tubrog muab nwg raab muv nkaug Yexus saab taav to ntshua, taamsim ntawd ntshaav hab dlej lug si quas laim.
(Tug kws pum zaaj nuav, nwg ua timkhawv qha rua suavdlawg  has tas yeej muaj tseeb, hab nwg paub has tas nwg has tseeb xwb, mej txhaj yuav ntseeg zaaj ntawd.)
Qhov nuav muaj lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws has tas, “Nwg tej txhaa yeej tsi muaj ib yaag yuav luv le.”
Hab Vaajtswv txujlug muaj dlua ib nqai has tas, “Yuav muaj tuabneeg saib ntsoov tug kws puab xuas muv nkaug.”

Tom qaab ntawd, Yauxej kws nyob peg lub nroog Alimathas tuaj, nwg moog thov Philaj ca nwg muab Yexus lub cev txu. (Yauxej yog Yexus ib tug thwjtim hab, tabsis nwg tsi qha rua leejtwg paub, rua qhov nwg ntshai cov Yudais.) Philaj tso cai rua Yauxej; yog le ntawd, Yauxej txhaj moog muab Yexus lub cev txu coj moog log.
Nikaudemaus tug kws tub moog cuag Yexus ib zag thaus tsaus ntuj nrug Yauxej moog, nwg nqaa ib co roj ntoos tsw qaab tov cov tshuaj tsw qaab kws hu ua alau-es kwvlaam le peb caug tawm choj.
Obtug muab Yexus lub cev txu lug, muab cov tshuaj tsw qaab pleev hab muab ntaub maag qhwv Yexus lub cev lawv le cov Yudais txuj kevcai log tuag kws puab ibtxwm ua.

Muaj ib lub vaaj nyob ntawm qhov chaw kws puab muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, nyob huv lub vaaj ntawd muaj ib lub qhov ntxaa tshab kws tseem tsi tau muaj leejtwg muab tuabneeg tuag log rua huv le.
Rua qhov nub ntawd yog nub kws cov Yudais Npaaj ua kevcai hab puab txhaj coj Yexus lub cev moog tso rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws nyob ze ntawd.
Nubkaaj thaus sawv ntxuv kaaj ntug txoog, Malis Madalas moog txug ntawm lub ntxaa hab nwg pum dlaim txag zeb kws npug lub rooj ntxaas tub dlov rua ib saab lawm.

Malis txawm dlha rov qaab lug cuag Ximoos Petus hab tug thwjtim kws Yexus hlub, hab nwg has rua obtug tas, “Puab tub muab tug Tswv nqaa tawm huv qhov ntxaa lawm, peb tsi paub sov puab coj nwg moog tso rua qhov twg lawm.”
Petus hab tug thwjtim ntawd txawm moog rua tom lub ntxaa.
Obtug sis tw dlha moog, tabsis tug thwjtim ntawd dlha ceev dlua Petus, nwg txhaj xub moog txug ntawm lub ntxaa.
Nwg nyo ntshis moog xauj huv lub ntxaa, nwg pum dlaim ntaub maag kws qhwv Yexus hle ua ib pawg rua huv, tabsis nwg tsi nkaag moog rua huv.
Thaus Ximoos Petus moog txug, nwg txawm nkaag plawg moog saib huv lub qhov ntxaa. Nwg pum dlaim ntaub maag kws qhwv Yexus hle ua ib pawg rua huv,
hab nwg pum dlaim ntaub kws qhwv Yexus taubhau tais tso rua ib caag, tsi nyob nrug dlaim ntaub maag kws qhwv Yexus lub cev.
Tug thwjtim kws xub moog txug ntawm lub ntxaa maam le moog rua huv, nwg tau pum tej ntawd hab ntseeg.
(Obtug tseem tsi tau totaub Vaajtswv txujlug kws has tas, nwg yuav sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug.)
Tom qaab ntawd, obtug rov qaab lug tsev lawm.
Tabsis Malis tseem sawv ntawm lub qhov ntxaa saab nrau quaj. Thaus nwg tseem quaj quaj ntawd, nwg nyo ntshis xauj huv lub qhov ntxaa;
nwg pum ob tug timtswv ceebtsheej naav rig tsho dlawb paug nyob ntawm qhov chaw kws tso Yexus lub cev rua, ib tug nyob peg taubhau hab ib tug nyob nraag kutaw.
Obtug nug Malis has tas, “Mivntxhais, ua le caag koj quaj?” Malis teb obtug has tas, “Sov puab coj kuv tug Tswv moog tso rua qhov twg lawm, kuv tsi paub le.”
Thaus Malis has le ntawd taag, nwg tig hlo lug pum Yexus sawv ntawm nwg ib saab, tabsis nwg tsi paub has tas yog Yexus.

Yexus nug Malis has tas, “Mivntxhais, ua le caag koj quaj?” Malis xaav has tas Yexus yog tug txivneej kws tu lub vaaj ntawd, nwg txhaj nug has tas, “Tug tswv, yog koj muab nwg moog tso rua qhov twg lawm, thov koj qha rua kuv, kuv yuav moog nqaa nwg rov qaab lug.”
Yexus has rua Malis has tas, “Malis!” Malis tig hlo moog saib Yexus, hab ua lug Henplais has rua Yexus has tas, “Lanpaunis!” (Lu lug nuav txhais has tas, “Xwbfwb.”)

Yexus has rua Malis has tas, “Koj tsi xob tuav kuv, rua qhov kuv tseem tsi tau rov moog cuag kuv Txiv. Koj ca le moog has rua kuv cov kwvtij has tas, kuv yuav rov moog cuag tug kws yog kuv Txiv hab mej Txiv, nwg yog kuv tug Vaajtswv hab mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Yog le ntawd, Malis Madalas txhaj rov qaab moog qha rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Kuv tub pum tug Tswv lawm”; hab Malis qha Yexus tej lug rua puab.

Nubkaaj thaus tsaus ntuj, cov thwjtim sis sau ua ke rua huv ib lub tsev hab laag qhovrooj huv tuabsi, rua qhov puab ntshai cov Yudais tej numtswv. Thaus ntawd, Yexus lug sawv nruab nraab huv puab, Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le muaj kev kaaj sab.”
Thaus Yexus has le ntawd taag, nwg cev nwg ob txhais teg hab thws nwg saab taav rua puab saib. Cov thwjtim zoo sab heev, rua qhov puab pum tug Tswv lawm.
Yexus rov has rua puab dlua has tas, “Mej ca le muaj kev kaaj sab. Leej Txiv khaiv kuv lug le caag, kuv yuav khaiv mej moog ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.”
Thaus Yexus has le ntawd taag, nwg txawm tshuab paa rua puab hab has tas, “Mej ca le txais yuav Vaaj Ntsujplig tug Dlawbhuv.
Yog mej zaam txim rua leejtwg, Vaajtswv yuav zaam txim rua tug ntawd; yog mej tsi zaam txim rua leejtwg, Vaajtswv yuav tsi zaam tug ntawd lub txim hab.”
Thaumas (tug kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Ntxaib) yog ib tug ntawm kaum ob tug thwjtim, nwg tsi nrug cov thwjtim nyob ua ke thaus Yexus lug tshwm rua puab pum.

Cov thwjtim qha rua Thaumas has tas, “Peb tub pum tug Tswv lawm.” Thaumas has rua puab has tas, “Yog kuv tsi pum cov qhov ntsa hlau ntawm nwg xibteg, kuv tsi tau muab kuv tug ntivteg xuas cov qhov ntsa hlau hab yog kuv tsi tau xuas lub qhov puab nkaug nwg saab taav, mas kuv yeej tsi ntseeg le.”

Tau ib limtam tom qaab Yexus cov thwjtim rov tuaj sis sau rua huv lub tsev ntawd dlua, zag nuav Thaumas nrug puab nyob. Puab laag qhovrooj huv tuabsi, tabsis Yexus ca le lug sawv nruab nraab huv puab hab has tas, “Mej ca le muaj kev kaaj sab.”
Yexus has rua Thaumas has tas, “Koj ca le saib kuv ob txhais teg hab cev koj tug ntivteg lug xuas. Cev koj txhais teg lug xuas lub qhov ntawm kuv saab taav. Tsi xob ua xyem xyaav, ca le ntseeg.”
Thaumas teb Yexus has tas, “Koj yog kuv tug Tswv, hab yog kuv tug Vaajtswv!”
Yexus has rua Thaumas has tas, “Koj pum kuv, koj txhaj ntseeg los? Tug kws tsi tau pum kuv tabsis nwg ntseeg, tug ntawd tau koob moov.”
Yexus ua ntau yaam txujci tseemceeb rua nwg cov thwjtim pum, tabsis tsi tau muab sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav.
Tej kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav yog sau lug qha kuas mej ntseeg  has tas, Yexus yog tug Mexiyas kws yog Vaajtswv tug Tub, txhua tug kws ntseeg Yexus, yuav tau txujsa.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus rov lug tshwm rua nwg cov thwjtim pum nraag ntug Havtxwv Tinpelias; hab qhov kws nwg lug tshwm rua puab pum muaj le nuav.

Ximoos Petus, Thaumas (tug kws muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Ntxaib), Nathana-ees (tug kws nyob huv lub zog Kanas peg xeev Kalilais), Xenpedais ob tug tub, hab muaj dlua ob tug ntawm Yexus cov thwjtim tuaj nyob ua ke.

Ximoos Petus has rua cov thwjtim ntawd tas, “Kuv yuav moog ntaus ntseg.” Puab has rua Petus has tas, “Peb yuav nrug koj moog hab.” Puab txawm nce rua huv nkoj, mo ntawd puab ntaus ntseg ib mos, tabsis tsi tau ib tug ntseg le.
Thaus kaaj ntug txoog, Yexus lug sawv tim ntug dlej, tabsis cov thwjtim tsi paub has tas yog Yexus.
Yexus nug puab has tas, “Cov hluas, mej ntaus tsi tau ntseg le los?” Puab teb has tas, “Ntaus tsi tau ib tug le.”

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le ntaus mej lub vaag rua ntawm lub nkoj saab xis rua huv txhaj yuav tau ntseg.” Yog le ntawd, puab txawm muab lub vaag ntaus rua huv hab lub vaag maag tau ntseg ntau heev, puab nqug tsi tau lub vaag lug rua huv nkoj le.

Tug thwjtim kws Yexus hlub has rua Petus has tas, “Tug sawv tid yog peb tug Tswv ntaag los sav!” Thaus Petus nov dlheev has tas peb tug Tswv, Petus txawm muab nwg lub tsho ntev lug naav, (Rua qhov nwg muab hle lawm) nwg txawm dlha rua huv havtxwv.

Cov thwjtim kws tseem nyob huv lub nkoj, puab nkuam lub nkoj hab nqug lub vaag kws maag ntseg puv nkaus lug rua ntawm ntug dlej, rua qhov puab nyob tsi dleb ntawm ntug dlej kwvlaam le tsib caug dlaaj xwb.
Thaus puab moog txug tim ntug lawm, puab pum ib cub thee cig ntsaa thuav muaj ntseg hab ncuav ci nyob sau cub thee ntawd.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le nqaa cov ntseg kws mej nyavnyuas ntaus tau tug puav lug ntawm nuav.”

Ximoos Petus nce rua huv lub nkoj nqug lub vaag kws maag tau ntseg puv nkaus ntawd lug rua tim ntug, cov ntseg luj kws puab ntaus tau ntawd muaj ib puas tsib caug peb tug, txawm yog maag tau ntseg ntau npaum le ntawd los lub vaag tsi ndluag ib qho le.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le lug noj tshais.” Cov thwjtim tsi muaj ib tug muaj cuabkaav nug Yexus has tas, “Koj yog leejtwg?” rua qhov puab paub has tas nwg yog puab tug Tswv.
Yog le ntawd, Yexus txawm moog muab ncuav hab muab ntseg lug faib rua puab noj.
Tom qaab kws Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm, nwg lug tshwm rua cov thwjtim pum peb zag rua zag nuav.

Thaus puab noj tshais taag lawm, Yexus has rua Ximoos Petus has tas, “Ximoos Yauhaas tug tub, koj hlub kuv tshaaj puab cov nuav los?” Ximoos teb Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yeej paub has tas kuv hlub koj.” Yexus has rua Ximoos has tas, “Koj ca le yug kuv cov mivnyuas yaaj.”

Yexus rov has dlua zag ob has tas, “Ximoos Yauhaas tug tub, koj puas hlub kuv?” Ximoos teb Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yeej paub has tas kuv hlub koj.” Yexus has rua Ximoos has tas, “Koj ca le yug kuv paab yaaj.”

Yexus rov has dlua zag peb has tas, “Ximoos Yauhaas tug tub, koj puas hlub kuv?” Petus nyuaj sab heev rua qhov Yexus nug Petus peb zag has tas, “Koj puas hlub kuv?” Petus txawm has rua Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj yeej paub ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi; koj yeej paub has tas kuv hlub koj.” Yexus has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le yug kuv paab yaaj.

Kuv qha tseeb rua koj has tas, thaus koj tseem hluas koj xaav moog qhov twg, koj ca le tu cev zoj zeeg moog xwb. Tabsis thaus koj laug lawm, koj yuav xyaab teg rua luas khi hab luas yuav coj koj moog rua qhov chaw kws koj tsi xaav moog.”
(Yexus has le ntawd, yog Yexus has tas, Petus yuav tuag le caag txhaj ua rua Vaajtswv tau koob meej.) Yexus has rua Petus has tas, “Koj ca le nrug kuv moog.”
Petus tig lug pum tug thwjtim kws Yexus hlub nyob tom obtug qaab; nwg yog tug kws txaav lug rua ntawm Yexus thaus puab noj mo hab nug has tas, “Tug Tswv, leejtwg yog tug kws yuav ntxeev sab rua koj?”
Thaus Petus pum tug thwjtim ntawd, Petus nug Yexus has tas, “Tug Tswv, ua le tug txivneej nuav ne, tsua yuav zoo le caag?”
Yexus teb Petus has tas, “Yog kuv ca nwg nyob moog txug nub kws kuv rov qaab lug, yeej tsi ua le caag rua koj. Koj ca le nrug kuv moog!”

Zaaj ntawd nrov nchaa moog thoob plawg rua tej tuabneeg suavdlawg has tas, tug thwjtim ntawd yuav tsi tuag. Tabsis Yexus tsi tau has tas, tug thwjtim ntawd yuav tsi tuag; Yexus has tas, “Yog kuv ca nwg nyob moog txug nub kws kuv rov qaab lug, yeej tsi ua le caag rua koj?”
Tug thwjtim ntawd yog tug kws has tej lug nuav hab muab sau tseg rua huv ntawv; hab peb paub has tas, tej lug kws nwg has yeej muaj tseeb.
Tseem muaj ntau yaam kws Yexus tau ua taag lug lawm. Yog yuav muab tej ntawd sau tseg huv tuabsi rua huv ntawv, kuv xaav has tas lub nplajteb nuav yuav tsi muaj chaw txaus ntim tej ntawv ntawd.
